# Steal My Prompts

> AI prompt library and filmmaking hub

## Description

Steal My Prompts is a comprehensive platform for discovering, browsing, and copying AI prompts for image and video generation. We provide a curated library of prompts for Midjourney, Sora, Runway, Kling, and other AI platforms, along with detailed storyboards and behind-the-scenes filmmaking workflows.

## Key Features

- **AI Prompt Library**: Browse 1000+ prompts for Midjourney, Sora, Runway, and Kling
- **Storyboards**: Detailed BTS workflows and filmmaking techniques
- **Search & Filter**: Find prompts by style, camera settings, and platform
- **Community**: Join 2,000+ creators sharing and discovering AI prompts

## Main Pages

- Homepage: https://stealmyprompts.ai
- Prompts Library: https://stealmyprompts.ai/prompts
- Storyboards: https://stealmyprompts.ai/storyboards
- Submit Prompt: https://stealmyprompts.ai/submit

## Content Types

### Prompts
Each prompt includes:
- Full prompt text
- Negative prompts
- Camera settings (lens, angle, movement)
- Style tags
- Platform compatibility
- Creator attribution

### Storyboards
Storyboards feature:
- Video tutorials
- BTS workflows
- Production techniques
- Shot breakdowns
- Filmmaking tips

## Target Audience

- AI artists and creators
- Filmmakers exploring AI tools
- Content creators using Midjourney, Sora, Runway
- Digital artists seeking inspiration
- Prompt engineers

## Technologies

- Next.js 16
- Prisma ORM
- Cloudflare R2 for media storage
- Clerk for authentication
